text.section: In this section, "sound amplification system" means a compact disc player, a radio, a tape player, or a similar device.

When a motor vehicle is being operated on a highway, the driver of the vehicle may not operate or permit the operation of a sound amplification system from the vehicle that can be heard outside the vehicle from 50 or more feet.

section.section: A person who violates this section is subject to criminal penalties under § 27-101 of this article.
A violation of this section is not considered a moving violation for purposes of § 16-402 of this article.
